meanings: [명사] (피부·장기 등의) transplant, transplantation, implant, (피부·뼈 등의) graft, [동사] transplant, implant, (피부·뼈 등을) graft

vlive.korean: 근데 이렇게 수염 많이 자라려면 이식을 해야 될 것 같은데? To have such thick bears, I guess I need some transplantation. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 늦기 전에 온다는 게 오늘이 되버렸네🙈
vlive.english: To have such thick bears, I guess I need some transplantation.

vlive.korean: [나 손바닥에 쿠션 이식했어 우리 홍시 폭신하게 받아주려고] 어우 뭐야 이러고 쿵! [I implanted cushions on my palms so that you won't feel any shock] Wow, what? Thud! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [PENTAGON] ※미래형 머리!!※ 눈을 가려도 귀여움은 가려지지 않는 요정들만 가능💇🏻‍♂️ (PENTAGON talking about WOOSEOK’s hair)
vlive.english: [I implanted cushions on my palms so that you won't feel any shock] Wow, what? Thud!

vlive.korean: [헐 그래도 하나 남으셨네요... 전 인공심장 이식했어요...] - 205개 있었어요? - 205개나... There were 205? - 205? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 천회장님의 귀요미애기들 말레이시아가요~ (NCT calling with Chenle)
저는 이식이라고 - 베이식과 원식은 근데... I'm Basick. - Basick and Wonsik. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Ravi X Rooftop Live - 라비의 루프탑라이브!
이게 바로 채연이식 응원... This is how Chae Yeon supports people. 듣기 View video DIA : [DIA]채연이와 다이아는 지금 드라마 촬영중
vlive.english: This is how Chae Yeon supports people.

examples.korean: Surgeons have successfully transplanted a liver into a four-year-old boy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 외과의들이 네 살짜리 소년에게 간을 성공적으로 이식시켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Surgeons have successfully transplanted a liver into a four-year-old boy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The skin graft failed to take. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피부 이식이 성공하지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The skin graft failed to take. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: New skin had to be grafted on from his back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 등에서 새 피부를 떼어다 이식해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: New skin had to be grafted on from his back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was on a wait list for a liver transplant. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 간 이식 수술 대기자 명단에 올라 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was on a wait list for a liver transplant. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His only chance of survival was a heart transplant. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 유일한 생존 가능성은 심장 이식이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His only chance of survival was a heart transplant. Add to Wordbook
